alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp; Fortymile Country; Upper Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 09 at 5:36AM AKDT until October 10 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches through tomorrow morning. * WHERE...Fortymile Country, Upper Tanana Valley, Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp and Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Snow will reduce visibility and may cause slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially in passes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be heaviest from the late morning through the evening today.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp; Fortymile Country; Upper Tanana Valley
